alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 11:08AM EST until January 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Grand River at Portland affecting Ionia County. Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County. Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County. .Moderate to heavy rain has fallen on a primed snowpack, much of which has now melted, and that water is now reaching the rivers, resulting in river rises. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sycamore Creek at Holt. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river, in the Lansing Municipal Golf Course and sections of East Mt. Hope Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Saturday was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 6.2 feet Saturday, February 03. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.4 feet on 04/20/2013. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. Sunday afternoon at 115 PM EST.
